channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Off-duty pilot who tried to cut a flight’s engines midair to be sentenced in federal case
item.description: A former Alaska Airlines pilot who tried to cut the engines of a passenger flight in 2023 is set to appear for sentencing in federal court in Portland...

item.title: Polish prime minister says weekend rail line explosion near Warsaw was act of 'sabotage'
item.description: Polish prime minister says weekend rail line explosion near Warsaw was act of 'sabotage'

item.title: FAA lifts order slashing flights, allowing commercial airlines to resume their regular schedules

item.title: Trump says US may have discussions with Maduro as aircraft carrier arrives in Caribbean
item.description: President Donald Trump says the U.S. “may be having some discussions” with Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro

item.title: Foreign enrollment at US colleges holds steady, for now, despite Trump's visa crackdown
item.description: A new report finds that foreign students enrolled at U.S. colleges in strong numbers this fall despite fears that a Trump administration crackdown wou...
